name: Crocodile
text: During Your Turn On Play: If your leader's type includes (Cross-guild) or (Baroque Works), place up to one of your opponents power 2000 or lower characters on the bottom of its owner's deck.

effect.text: If your leader's type includes (Cross-guild) or (Baroque Works), place up to one of your opponents power 2000 or lower characters on the bottom of its owner's deck.
